parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The description of the dataset. It must not exceed 1,024 characters in length.

parameters.name: DataType
parameters.description:
The data type. Valid values:

*   COMMON: Common (Default)
*   PIC
*   TEXT
*   TABLE
*   VIDEO
*   AUDIO
*   INDEX

parameters.name: InitVersion
parameters.description: The initial version of the dataset.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. It cannot be an empty string and must not exceed 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description: The source of the dataset. Currently, only DataWorks is supported.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The storage type. Currently supported values:

*   OSS
*   NAS: General-purpose NAS file systems
*   EXTREMENAS: Extreme NAS file systems
*   DLF_LANCE: Data Lake Formation

Valid values:

*   NAS: General-purpose NAS file systems
*   MAXCOMPUTE: MaxCompute table
*   CPFS: Cloud Parallel File Storage
*   BMCPFS: CPFS for Lingjun
*   EXTREMENAS: Extreme NAS file systems
*   OSS: Object Storage Service
*   DLF_LANCE: Data Lake Formation.
